eLabel.text: Skin for OPD Images by stein17

Extensions/Weather information/Menu, then add green. When you have entered the place, down to location code. Find yellow for code, confirm with green (OK), important again OK. More importantly with red back, otherwise you have to start all over again. Exit now with Exit, Restart user interface, possibly complete restart..

Menu/ Settings/ Operation and surface/ OSD, *2nd infobar* on *2nd Infobar INFO* to adjust. Cover the information bag with Event View: Menu/ Settings/ Operation and surface/ Hotkey-Settings/Info Press button,EPG choose, in EPG *Show shipment details* choose. The entry that exists, deactivate by clicking the OK button.
Settings 2te Infobar With 2x Ok call, Show EventView using the info button
Manage your images in the multiboot
Skin adjustments in Menu / Settings / Operation and Interface / Setup-Ultimate.
